objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point Autofocus
• Full HD 1080p Video Recording
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 focus points
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (2.36M dots)
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angles
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for instant sharing
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel
• Film simulation modes for creative photography
• Up to 8 FPS continuous shooting speed
• Weather-sealed construction for durability

banner_details:
The banner is a modern product advertisement layout featuring a high-end camera. The background is a dark grid style, split into four quadrants with subtle color shifts in dark greys and blacks. A large, high-resolution image of the camera model is placed prominently on the right side. On the left, the top portion includes the brand name (`heading`) and model name (`subheading`) using bold, sans-serif fonts, followed by a short camera type descriptor (`description`). A promotional tagline (`tagline`) is placed just below. Key technical features are listed vertically in bullet format (`features`). A vibrant red price tag (`price`) and a call to action button (`cta_button`) with white text (`cta`) are displayed at the bottom left. The layout balances technical information and visual appeal using bold typographic hierarchy and a strong call-to-action.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #000000
- Dark Gray: #1A1A1A, #2D2D2D, #0D0D0D, #141414, #2A2A2A
- White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray: #CCCCCC
- Red: #E63946
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a striking and refined color palette, dominated by sleek matte black (#1A1A1A) and metallic gray (#3C3C3C), representing professionalism and functionality. Silver highlights (#BFBFBF) on the dials and branding add contrast and emphasize precision. Accents of white (#FFFFFF) in the text enhance legibility and branding clarity. A touch of vibrant orange (#F28C28) near the lens introduces visual interest without distracting from the overall aesthetic. Colors are expertly blended through shadowing and reflections, creating depth and dimension while ensuring each color plays a distinct role. Ideal ad banner themes: modern, high-tech, minimal.
